name: Matterhorn
description:
A simple snowboarding game made with Godot. You play as a snowboarder going down a mountain trying to collects coins while dodging trees.

Controls

  • Left and right to lean left and right.
  • Space to restart on death.
  • M to mute the sound.

Read More

The game was created to learn about the Godot engine. If you're interesting in reading more checkout the project write up: Matterhorn Project on minibuids.io.
